name: BunnyGame
description:
Looks easy, doesn't it? Well, think again!

The file contains a jar. file, so you are required to have Java in order to play it.

Eat the carrot to gain 100 points.

Eat the little bunny to gain 10HP.

If you eat the pinecone, you will lose 20HP.

If you miss eating the carrot, you will lose 20HP.

Base HP: 100

*****Controls*****

Arrowkeys (Left, Right): Move left and right (Movement speed is slow, so need to keep pressing the button to move faster)

*All sprites were borrowed from the internet.
